Title: Prediction of stock price using Artificial Neural Network: A case of Indonesia
Source title: Journal of Theoretical and Applied Information Technology
Affiliations: Grad. School, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Napitupulu, T.A., Grad. School, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Wijaya, Y.B., Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: Artificial Neural Network (ANN) has been widely used in many application because of its ability to solve non-parametric problems. ANN is also recognized as a good and widely used tool in forecasting stock prices. Traditionally stock forecasting in Indonesia usually used time series analysis. This paper compared the stock forecasting result of ANTM (PT Aneka Tambang) using ANN and that of Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA). The results of the study showed that forecasting using ANN method has smaller error than ARIMA method. been developed for different hybrid power system configurations for tuning the proportional-integral controller for SVC. Transient responses of different autonomous configurations show that SVC controller with its gained tuned by the ANNs provide optimum system performance for a variety of loads. © 2005-2013 JATIT & LLS. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: ARIMA; Artificial Neural Network; Stock forecasting; Time-series
